title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.42 - Conservation requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.42 - Conservation requirements

State Regulations

It is the policy of the commission that all applications
involving out-of-the basin transfers indicate the conservation measures which
have been taken to forestall the need for a transfer of Delaware River Basin
water. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
890.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
